channel.title: [PI] Leeches Problem - EDIT

item.title: [PI] Leeches Problem - EDIT
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

drubrkletern:

Exactly, and the missing bracket could be around there, and again, it might not be a bracket, could be something else but from first look it looks like its a bracket.

Well, I make them “if” now and 14 errors are gone, but I still have 14 more. My codes are now:

		if leechRanged(int index) {
                if (Server.playerHandler.players[index] != null) {
                        final Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[index];
                        final int pX = c.getX();
                        final int pY = c.getY();
                        final int oX = c2.getX();
                        final int oY = c2.getY();
                        c.startAnimation(12575);
                        EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
                                int loops = 0;
                                public void execute(EventContainer s) {
                                        loops++;
                                        if (loops == 5) {
                                                int offX = (pY - oY)* -1;
                                                int offY = (pX - oX)* -1;
                                                c.sendMessage("You leech your opponent's range.");
                                                c.getPA().createPlayersProjectile(pX, pY, offX, offY, 50, 45, 2236, 43, 31, - c.oldPlayerIndex - 1, 0);
                                                if (c.rangeInc < 10)
                                                        c.rangeInc += 1;
                                                if (c2.rangeInc > -25)
                                                        c2.rangeInc -= 1;
                                        } else if (loops == 7) {
                                                c2.gfx0(2238);
                                                s.stop();
                                        }
                                }
                        }, 100);
                }
        }
       
        if leechMagic(int index) {
                if (Server.playerHandler.players[index] != null) {
                        final Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[index];
                        final int pX = c.getX();
                        final int pY = c.getY();
                        final int oX = c2.getX();
                        final int oY = c2.getY();
                        c.startAnimation(12575);
                        EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
                                int loops = 0;
                                public void execute(EventContainer s) {
                                        loops++;
                                        if (loops == 5) {
                                                int offX = (pY - oY)* -1;
                                                int offY = (pX - oX)* -1;
                                                c.sendMessage("You leech your opponent's magic.");
                                                c.getPA().createPlayersProjectile(pX, pY, offX, offY, 50, 45, 2240, 43, 31, - c.oldPlayerIndex - 1, 2);
                                                if (c.magicInc < 10)
                                                        c.magicInc += 1;
                                                if (c2.magicInc > -25)
                                                        c2.magicInc -= 1;
                                        } else if (loops == 7) {
                                                c2.gfx0(2242);
                                                s.stop();
                                        }
                                }
                        }, 100);
                }
        }
       
        if leechDefence(int index) {
                if (Server.playerHandler.players[index] != null) {
                        final Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[index];
                        final int pX = c.getX();
                        final int pY = c.getY();
                        final int oX = c2.getX();
                        final int oY = c2.getY();
                        c.startAnimation(12575);
                        EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
                                int loops = 0;
                                public void execute(EventContainer s) {
                                        loops++;
                                        if (loops == 5) {
                                                int offX = (pY - oY)* -1;
                                                int offY = (pX - oX)* -1;
                                                c.sendMessage("You leech your opponent's defence.");
                                                c.getPA().createPlayersProjectile(pX, pY, offX, offY, 50, 45, 2244, 43, 31, - c.oldPlayerIndex - 1, 3);
                                                if (c.defInc < 10)
                                                        c.defInc += 1;
                                                if (c2.defInc > -25)
                                                        c2.defInc -= 1;
                                        } else if (loops == 7) {
                                                c2.gfx0(2246);
                                                s.stop();
                                        }
                                }
                        }, 100);
                }
        }

        if leechSpecial(int index) {
                if (Server.playerHandler.players[index] != null) {
                        final Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[index];
                        final int pX = c.getX();
                        final int pY = c.getY();
                        final int oX = c2.getX();
                        final int oY = c2.getY();
                        if (c.specAmount >= 10)  {
                                return;
                        }
                        if (c2.specAmount <= 0) {
                                return;
                        }
                        c.startAnimation(12575);
                        EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
                                int loops = 0;
                                public void execute(EventContainer s) {
                                        loops++;
                                        if (loops == 5) {
                                                int offX = (pY - oY)* -1;
                                                int offY = (pX - oX)* -1;
                                                c.sendMessage("You leech your opponent's special attack.");
                                                c.getPA().createPlayersProjectile(pX, pY, offX, offY, 50, 45, 2256, 43, 31, - c.oldPlayerIndex - 1, 6);
                                                c.specAmount += 1;
                                                c2.specAmount -= 1;
                                                c.getItems().addSpecialBar(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]);
                                                c2.sendMessage("Your special attack has been drained.");
                                        } else if (loops == 7) {
                                                c2.gfx0(2258);
                                                s.stop();
                                        }
                                }
                        }, 100);
                }
        }

        if leechStrength(int index) {
                if (Server.playerHandler.players[index] != null) {
                        final Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[index];
                        final int pX = c.getX();
                        final int pY = c.getY();
                        final int oX = c2.getX();
                        final int oY = c2.getY();
                        c.startAnimation(12575);
                        EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
                                int loops = 0;
                                public void execute(EventContainer s) {
                                        loops++;
                                        if (loops == 5) {
                                                int offX = (pY - oY)* -1;
                                                int offY = (pX - oX)* -1;
                                                c.sendMessage("You leech your opponent's strength.");
                                                c.getPA().createPlayersProjectile(pX, pY, offX, offY, 50, 45, 2248, 43, 31, - c.oldPlayerIndex - 1, 4);
                                                if (c.strInc < 10) {
                                                        c.strInc += 1;
                                                }
                                                if (c2.strInc > -25) {
                                                        c2.strInc -= 1;
                                                }
                                        } else if (loops == 7) {
                                                c2.gfx0(2250);
                                                s.stop();
                                        }
                                }
                        }, 100);
                }
        }

        if leechAttack(int index) {
                if (Server.playerHandler.players[index] != null) {
                        final Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[index];
                        final int pX = c.getX();
                        final int pY = c.getY();
                        final int oX = c2.getX();
                        final int oY = c2.getY();
                        c.startAnimation(12575);
                        EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {
                                int loops = 0;
                                public void execute(EventContainer s) {
                                        loops++;
                                        if (loops == 5) {
                                                int offX = (pY - oY)* -1;
                                                int offY = (pX - oX)* -1;
                                                if (c.attInc < 10)
                                                        c.attInc += 1;
                                                if (c2.attInc > -25)
                                                        c2.attInc -= 1;
                                                c.sendMessage("You leech your opponent's attack.");
                                                c.getPA().createPlayersProjectile(pX, pY, offX, offY, 50, 45, 2231, 43, 31, - c.oldPlayerIndex - 1, 1);
                                        } else if (loops == 7) {
                                                c2.gfx0(2232);
                                                s.stop();
                                        }
                                }
                        }, 100);
                }
        }

								
								if applyLeeches(int index) {

Compiler error:

I think you added the methods in another method’s context.
Not sure but I had a sort-like error and I had put a new method in the middle of another one <.<

Nope, not in any other.

Must be a missing bracket/addition somewhere, its not always 100 errors if the class is short enough/depending on were the void is.

100 errors? I have 28.

Which is why I said [quote]its not always 100 errors if the class is short enough/depending on were the void is.[/quote]
I mean it won’t show 100 errors if the class is short enough/depending on were the void is.
[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

EDIT:

Well, I made them “if” now and 14 errors are gone, but I still have 14 more. My codes are now:

		if leechRanged(int index) {
                if (Server.playerHandler.players[index] != null) {
                        final Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[index];
                        final int pX = c.getX();
                        final int pY = c.getY();

                        final int oY = c2.getY();
                        c.startAnimation(12575);
                        EventManager.getSingleton().addEvent(new Event() {

                                                c.getPA().createPlayersProjectile(pX, pY, offX, offY, 50, 45, 2236, 43, 31, - c.oldPlayerIndex - 1, 0);
                                                if (c.rangeInc < 10)
                                                        c.rangeInc += 1;
                                                if (c2.rangeInc > -25)
                                                        c2.rangeInc -= 1;
                                        } else if (loops == 7) {
                                                c2.gfx0(2238);
                                                s.stop();
                                        }
                                }
                        }, 100);
                }
        }
       
        if leechMagic(int index) {
                if (Server.playerHandler.players[index] != null) {
